Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is designed to enhance your daily life in numerous ways. It's crafted with high-quality materials and cutting-edge technology to ensure it meets your needs perfectly. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, we're confident it will add significant value to your routine. For this unique opportunity, I'm proposing a special introductory price of $95 for you. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the difference our product can make in your life! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
